infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Allow Smart AI Assistant to verify your identity for secure diagnostics.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow Smart AI Assistant to capture voice input for on-device speech recognition.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Allow Smart AI Assistant to convert speech to text for native diagnostics.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allow Smart AI Assistant to access your location for native GPS diagnostics.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Allow Smart AI Assistant to create calendar entries for native capability checks.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Allow Smart AI Assistant to access contacts for native feature validation.
